attributes.action: Make referendum results null and void if voters are proved to be misled.
attributes.background: When a referendum is asked of the general public on matters of national interest the facts and figures presented to the voters should be perceived as honest and true. If this is not the case and opinions are swayed by incorrect or misleading information, the results should be disregarded.

rejection.details: Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
